name: I Shall Recycle
description:
In I Shall Recycle, your mission is to place the right items in the right garbage truck in order to make the recycle process efficient.

How to Play

Drag and drop the trash item into the corresponding truck. If it's a an apple, drag and drop it into the orange truck, for example.

Credits

Nielisson Mendonça - Graphics / Game Design
Jinxedbyte - Programming / Game Design
